name: America/Argentina/Cordoba
comments: Argentina (most areas: CB, CC, CN, ER, FM, MN, SE, SF)

name: America/Dawson_Creek
comments: MST - BC (Dawson Cr, Ft St John)

name: America/Fortaleza
comments: Brazil (northeast: MA, PI, CE, RN, PB)

name: America/Matamoros
comments: Central Time US - Coahuila, Nuevo León, Tamaulipas (US border)

name: America/Mazatlan
comments: Mountain Time - Baja California Sur, Nayarit, Sinaloa

name: America/Monterrey
comments: Central Time - Durango; Coahuila, Nuevo León, Tamaulipas (most areas)

name: America/Panama
comments: EST - Panama, Cayman, ON (Atikokan), NU (Coral H)

name: America/Sao_Paulo
comments: Brazil (southeast: GO, DF, MG, ES, RJ, SP, PR, SC, RS)

name: Antarctica/McMurdo
comments: New Zealand time - McMurdo, South Pole

name: Asia/Jayapura
comments: New Guinea (West Papua / Irian Jaya); Malukus/Moluccas

name: Asia/Makassar
comments: Borneo (east, south); Sulawesi/Celebes, Bali, Nusa Tengarra; Timor (west)

name: CET
comments: Choose a zone that observes CET, such as Europe/Paris.

name: CST6CDT
comments: Choose a zone that observes CST with United States daylight saving time rules, such as America/Chicago.

name: EET
comments: Choose a zone that observes EET, such as Europe/Sofia.

name: EST
comments: Choose a zone that currently observes EST without daylight saving time, such as America/Cancun.

name: EST5EDT
comments: Choose a zone that observes EST with United States daylight saving time rules, such as America/New_York.

name: HST
comments: Choose a zone that currently observes HST without daylight saving time, such as Pacific/Honolulu.

name: Indian/Kerguelen
comments: Kerguelen, St Paul Island, Amsterdam Island

name: MET
comments: Choose a zone that observes MET (sames as CET), such as Europe/Paris.

name: MST
comments: Choose a zone that currently observes MST without daylight saving time, such as America/Phoenix.

name: MST7MDT
comments: Choose a zone that observes MST with United States daylight saving time rules, such as America/Denver.

name: Pacific/Port_Moresby
comments: Papua New Guinea (most areas), Dumont d'Urville

name: PST8PDT
comments: Choose a zone that observes PST with United States daylight saving time rules, such as America/Los_Angeles.

name: WET
comments: Choose a zone that observes WET, such as Europe/Lisbon.
